1558.text:
We have created a
world for ourselves

1560.text:
where we are defined on social
media by the worst thing

1564.text:
that we ever did,
by our worst tweets,

1567.text:
That's not the world
I want to live in.

1569.text:
You said at the beginning we're
trying to think about the world

1571.text: that we want to live in.

1572.text:
The world I want to
live in is the world

1574.text:
where everybody-- and we know
this about human beings--

1577.text:
everybody is a mixture of
talents and sins and wisdom

1584.text:
And when somebody's mistake is
put in a wider human context--

1588.text:
which is something that social
media has forgotten how to do,

1590.text:
by and large-- that's the
world that I want to live in.
